Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Raffle Prize Collection
Parent and Company Donations
We are now collecting Prizes for the Raffle at this years Summer event, and request your generous donations. Please also approach your companies for donations. All funds raised go toward the EFC’s adopted charities and will help change the lives of those less fortunate than ourselves. Suggested donations might include: Electronics (iPads, iTouch, iPod, cameras, video camera & TV). Gift sets. Spa Treatment. Book Vouchers. Wine & Spirits. Gourmet (ambient) Food Hamper. Weekend Break. Children’s Toys & Soft Toys. Artwork, Ornaments & Soft Furnishings. Perfume & Cologne, Jewellery. Leather Purse or Wallet. Local Attraction Gift Card. Gift baskets. Use of a Sports Car for a Weekend. Sunday Brunch Certificate. Travel package. Homemade Gift Basket. Coffee Table Book.Consider recycling and donating any unwanted and unused gifts
Donations can be handed to Alice Gibbons at the BSKL Reception Desk
Your support and generosity is very much appreciated by the EFC
Regards, Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
